tool_description: Controls prosodic elements including stress patterns, intonation contours, and rhythm timing for natural speech flow.

input_text.description: Text to be processed for prosodic annotation

stress_pattern.description: Stress pattern: automatic, emphatic, subtle, custom

intonation_style.description: Intonation pattern: statement, question, exclamation, list

error_messages: Unsupported language: Provide a valid language code from supported languages list.
Invalid stress pattern: Use automatic, emphatic, subtle, or custom.
Invalid intonation style: Use statement, question, exclamation, or list.
Boundary position error: Phrase boundaries must be within text length and in ascending order.
Text too short: Provide at least 10 characters for prosodic analysis.
usage: Provide input text and language code, optionally specify stress patterns, intonation style, and phrase boundaries for prosodic control.
